subject: Doping (Sports)
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: The International Cycling Union on Monday ratified a report on the cyclist by American antidoping officials, and Tour organizers planned to remove him from the record books.
snippet: The International Cycling Union on Monday ratified a report on the cyclist by American antidoping officials, and Tour organizers planned to remove him from the record books.
